about_the_game:
In the world full of corruption and depression, the battle and struggle of a butler-styled automaton begins. Between the people and organizations that only think about their own needs and profits, the most loyal automaton begins to blow off his enemies.

The steampunk-inspired world with on-going desertification

By the overdeveloped steam & engine technologies, and by the consecutive climate disasters, the society and order begins to colapse. In the world running toward to a dystopian society, Nobles trust machine and automaton more than human, and Citizens have to risk every day in order to drink safe water. Between the endless collision of people that only think about their needs, the choice you make might change the future of the society.

Stylish combat action supported by 'Module System'

At 'The Garage', you can observe the 'modules' that are installed now, and can change freely at your will. You can set your own style of battle and prepare for the upcoming combat. Your choice and readiness will be the most powerful weapon of all.

During the battle, observe the upcoming combat and take the move wisely. Attack the enemies to fill your 'Gear Gauge', and request the weapon that suits for them. As you know, everyone has their own weakness.

Remember, the most important thing always is to protect your 'Lady'.

The first and the most important duty of yours is to protect the 'Lady', the only survivor of the noble family that you serve. Carve in the mission deep inside your circuit, and leave to the battle field that waits you. The beat deep inside your parts will never falter. Until the day you finally find out the suspect that caused terrifying event to the family you serve. And until the day you eliminate all dangers coming toward the 'Lady'.

name: MODULE:BERSERK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7470, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: MODULE:BERSERK is a 2D pixel "hard-boiled" action game with steampunk-inspired world of endless desertification and corruption. Play as a butler-styled automaton. Track down the suspect that caused terrifying event to the family you serve. And protect the only survivor, 'lady' from upcoming dangers.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
